title: Bilgewater Event for random game mode weekends!
body: If by some devine miracle a Riot member sees this post, could you maybe, possibly, PLEASEEEE bring it up in a discussion with your fellow Rioters to add the Bilgewater event to the random game mode weekends? I know that alot of my friends and myself loved the Bilgewater event when it was out and we would all love to play it again. Thanks for any info regarding this post!

replies.body: Please bring back the pirate announcer for SR from the Bilgewater event on a rotating map type thing.
